_header: Fortunate is he who hath the hap
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 432.
_description: Proverbial advice, translating ‘Felix quem faciunt aliena pericula cautum’ — one couplet

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
ffortunate is he who hathe the happeto bewarre by an other manis
                    clappe
